        protected boolean isBitSet(byte value,
                           int bit)

        Parameters:

        bit - bit position which is tested
        Returns:

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Connect to a Bluetooth device. On successfully connection Bluetooth machine state is automatically triggered. If the device is not found the process is automatically stopped.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - the Bluetooth address to connect to
